text: All of Madonna's adopted children are from Malawi, so it's no surprise that she would give back to the country that gave her so much love and happiness. The ` ` Living for Love'' singer has developed a clinic at the Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital in Blantyre. Named after her 11 - year - old Malawi - born daughter, Mercy James, the Mercy James Institute for Pediatric Surgery and Intensive Care will officially open its doors on July 11.
